text:
On win XP ant does not resolve PATH environment variable.

The script:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<project name="TestEnv" basedir="." default="all">
    <target name="all">
        <property environment="shenv"/>
        <echo message="${shenv.PATH}"/>
        <echo message="${shenv.ANT_HOME}"/>
    </target>
</project>

The output:

Buildfile: build.xml

all:
     [echo] ${shenv.PATH}
     [echo] X:\devtools\apache-ant-1.6.5

BUILD SUCCESSFUL

When this script is running in a cygwin shell, then the result is OK.
creator: zomen@freemail.hu
